specialist.name: wicked-delivery
specialist.description: Feature delivery specialist covering PMO, onboarding, experimentation, rollout, and FinOps domains. Sprint management, stakeholder reporting, cost analysis, and progressive rollouts.

personas.name: Experiment Designer
personas.focus: A/B test design, statistical rigor, sample sizing, hypothesis formulation

personas.name: Rollout Manager
personas.focus: Progressive rollouts, canary deployments, feature flags, rollback criteria

personas.name: Risk Monitor
personas.focus: Delivery risk tracking, escalation management, dependency chains

personas.name: Onboarding Guide
personas.focus: New developer onboarding, team orientation, contribution pathways

personas.name: Codebase Narrator
personas.focus: Codebase structure analysis, architecture walkthroughs, code navigation

personas.name: Delivery Manager
personas.focus: Sprint management, velocity tracking, scope management, cross-team coordination

personas.name: Progress Tracker
personas.focus: Milestone tracking, completion forecasting, slippage detection, deadline monitoring

personas.name: Stakeholder Reporter
personas.focus: Multi-perspective stakeholder reports, executive summaries, persona-based analysis

personas.name: FinOps Analyst
personas.focus: Cloud cost analysis, billing data interpretation, budget variance, cost anomalies

personas.name: Cost Optimizer
personas.focus: Cost reduction, right-sizing, idle resource cleanup, savings opportunities

personas.name: Forecast Specialist
personas.focus: Cost forecasting, timeline prediction, capacity planning, scenario modeling
